depauw.edu.myro.android.sandbox

Class DrawingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • depauw.edu.myro.android.sandbox.DrawingView

  • public class DrawingView
extends View
    Creates a customized view that allows shapes to be drawn on a canvas.
    Version:
    Summer 2014
    Author:
    Leonora Bresette Buccino and Alexander Miller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawingView(Context context, AttributeSet attrs)
      DrawingView constructor.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImage(Bitmap bit)
      Adds the given image to the canvas.
      void drawCircle(int x, int y, int radius, Paint paint)
      Draws a circle on the canvas with the center point at (x,y) and with the given radius and paint color
      void drawLine(int xStart, int yStart, int xEnd, int yEnd, Paint paint)
      Draws a line on the canvas that starts at (xStart,yStart) and ends at (xEnd,yEnd) with the given paint color
      void drawOval(int x, int y, int height, int width, Paint paint)
      Draws an oval on the given canvas centered at (x,y) with the given height, width and paint color.
      void drawPoint(int x, int y, Paint paint)
      draws a point on the canvas at (x,y) with given paint color
      void drawPolygon(int x, int y, int numOfSides, int radius, Paint paint)
      Draws a polygon centered at x,y with the given number of sides, radius and paint color.
      void drawRectangle(int x, int y, int length, int width, Paint paint)
      draws a rectangle on the canvas with the top left corner at x,y and with given length, width and paint color
      void drawText(java.lang.String text, int x, int y, Paint paint)
      Displays the given text on the canvas at (x,y) with given paint color

    • Method Detail

      • drawCircle

        public void drawCircle(int x,
              int y,
              int radius,
              Paint paint)
        Draws a circle on the canvas with the center point at (x,y) and with the given radius and paint color
        Parameters:
        x - the integer of the x coordinate of the center of the circle
        y - the integer of the y coordinate of the center of the circle
        radius - the integer value of the radius of the circle
        paint - the paint color of the circle

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine(int xStart,
            int yStart,
            int xEnd,
            int yEnd,
            Paint paint)
        Draws a line on the canvas that starts at (xStart,yStart) and ends at (xEnd,yEnd) with the given paint color
        Parameters:
        xStart - the starting x coordinate of the line
        yStart - the starting y coordinate of the line
        xEnd - the ending x coordinate of the line
        yEnd - the end y coordinate of the line
        paint - the color of the line

      • drawOval

        public void drawOval(int x,
            int y,
            int height,
            int width,
            Paint paint)
        Draws an oval on the given canvas centered at (x,y) with the given height, width and paint color.
        Parameters:
        x - the center x coordinate of the oval
        y - the center y coordinate of the oval
        height - the height of the oval
        width - the width of the oval
        paint - the color of the oval

      • drawPoint

        public void drawPoint(int x,
             int y,
             Paint paint)
        draws a point on the canvas at (x,y) with given paint color
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the point
        y - the y coordinate of the point
        paint - the color of the point

      • drawPolygon

        public void drawPolygon(int x,
               int y,
               int numOfSides,
               int radius,
               Paint paint)
        Draws a polygon centered at x,y with the given number of sides, radius and paint color. Does this using paths
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the center of the polygon
        y - the y coordinate of the center of the polygon
        numOfSides - the number of side the polygon has
        radius - the radius of the polygon
        paint - the color of the polygon

      • drawRectangle

        public void drawRectangle(int x,
                 int y,
                 int length,
                 int width,
                 Paint paint)
        draws a rectangle on the canvas with the top left corner at x,y and with given length, width and paint color
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
        y - the y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
        length - the length of the rectangle
        width - the width of the rectangle
        paint - the color of the rectangle

      • drawText

        public void drawText(java.lang.String text,
            int x,
            int y,
            Paint paint)
        Displays the given text on the canvas at (x,y) with given paint color
        Parameters:
        text - the string of text
        x - the x coordinate of the text
        y - the y coordinate of the text
        paint - the color of the text

      • addImage

        public void addImage(Bitmap bit)
        Adds the given image to the canvas. Takes in the image as a bitmap. This is used when taking a picture with the camera, getting a picture from the gallery or taking a picture with the scribbler
        Parameters:
        bit - the Bitmap of the image
